Urg ... I forgot how long Spears was with the Trainers..

::Firearm::

Firearm shruggs at her first question. "I'm not really sure, I wasn't 
working on it from the beginning. You might want to ask Ramulus about 
it."

He frowns at her rescue suggestion. "The Trainers probably know you're 
back. We won a battle and they retreated, Smokescreen got you back to 
the Ark."

He remembers Spears' preformance back at the Ark, "Where you did a 
great acting job, I may add."

Firearm's face turns serious again, thinking over her plan, "But I 
doubt the plan will work. They would probably know that the chip has 
been destroyed. Besides, from how Slayer showed himself at the battle, 
he's not a bot that would be easily disabled."

He sighs, "He killed Snow Cat and nearly took out Ramulus as well. 
With four or five Maximals shooting at him."

As soon as the words left his mouth, he knew he shouldn't have said 
them, but it was too late.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> She looked at him and listened. "I was with the Trainer for a while? 
> How long was I with them? And how is it that I came back, but he 
> didn't?" She a million and one questions run through her mind.
> 
> "Does he know that I'm back with you? If not, I may hav a plan to 
get 
> him back. I can go back to the trainers, and pretend to still be one 
> of them. Then I can get close to Striker, possably deactivate him 
and 
> haul him
